text: Mutujjidde omu omu, nga bwe twabatonda mu kusooka, byonna bye twabawa mubirese mabega wa mmwe, era tulaba bwe muzze temuleese bawolereza ba mmwe, abo be mwawozanga, nti mazima bo ne Katonda bakolera wamu ku mmwe, e nkolagana ekutuseewo wakati wa mmwe nebababulako abo be mwali mulowooza nti bâ€™akubawolereza
